item.description:
Join Members and Guests of the South Shore Fitness Meetup Group as we participate in a 5k Walk/Run. This is to benefit the Braintree Athletic Association. Here is way to give back for use of the facilities we use a group year round.

AND! After getting up nice and early, getting in our run or walk, we won't be a need to feel guilty for reaching for 2nds later!

5k is approximately 3.1 miles.

Check-in at the Registration Table at Braintree High School in the Cafeteria after 7am. Race starts at 8am (walkers at 7:45am) We can pick a meeting place closer to the date and do some warm-ups before the race.


5k Walk/Run Road Race Fundraiser
Thursday, November 26, 2009
Race Starts @ 8am (7:45 for walkers)
Meet by 7:30- registration starts at 7
Braintree High School
128 Town Street
Braintree, MA 02184
Registration in the Cafeteria

Meeting Place: TBA, most likely in the cafeteria

Cost: $17 by November 20th, $20 on Race Day (Non-Refundable) / The Registration Form is in the Files Section. If you have trouble opening it please let me know and I'll bring it to the next event you are attending (as long as we are going to the same event).
**Long Sleeve Tee Shirts guaranteed to the first 150 registered runners, send in those forms early!

Event Fee: NONE!

Organizer(s): Julie
Min/Max: There is no minimum. Attendance is unlimited.
Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Wednesday, November 19th

Please Note in your RSVP Comments if you are Walking or Running. Please print the Registration Form in the Files Section and mail it in or bring it with you.

Inclement Weather: The Road Race is taking place rain or shine.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Check out this site for tips (especially the warmup tips, but read the comments too. I found those pretty helpful as well)
http://www.runnerswor....
item.how_to_find_us: registration in the cafeteria, most likely meet there,

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 10th Annual Braintree Athletic Association Thanksgiving Day 5K Road Race & Walk
